text: The women's football tournament at the 2019 Pacific Games is being held from 8 to 20 July 2019. It is the 5th edition of the women's Pacific Games football tournament. Together with the men's competition, all matches are being played at the J.S. Blatter Stadium in Apia, Samoa. ==Teams== * * * * * * * * * * ==Venues== {| class="wikitable" !colspan=2|Apia |rowspan=4| |- |J.S. Blatter Stadium |- | |- |Capacity: 3,500 |} ==Group stage== ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Final stage== ===Bronze final=== ===Gold final=== ==Goalscorers== ==See also== *Football at the 2019 Pacific Games – Men's tournament *Football at the 2019 Pacific Games *Football at the Pacific Games ==References== ==External links== *Official 2019 Pacific Games website Womens
title: Football at the 2019 Pacific Games – Women's tournament
